document_data.name: Kllug
document_data.mainbody: '''Kllug''' was a [[goblin]] shaman in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1484 DR]], during a new assault by [[orc]] and [[drow]] on the [[Silver Marches]], Kllug and his fellow orc shaman [[Innanig]] led troops to an assault of [[Nesm√®]]. However, Kllug and Innanig were deceived by reborn [[Regis]].
